entry.title: Fifth-English-Blog
entry.content:
Fifth blog for Shadows cast by stars

For the last blog, I want to predicting the next story.

Right now, the Band doesnâ€™t have any adventages to fight with UA. But Cass can borrow power of Earth and Cass use the power to ause the earthquake. I think it is an important thing for the Band to win the war.

I think there is another important people can help the Band. He is the boy in the picture. Author doesnâ€™t tell us who he is. He may have powerful power. In the next story, he may appear and help the Band fight with UA government.

In 20~30 chapter, Avalon was not too active. But I believe that she will be more active in the next 10 charpters. Because I think she is the spy of the UA government. In my third blog, I have discussed her lifestyle and her meeting with Cass. I know that she likes the life in Corridor more than the Island and she hates her father who takes her to the Island. If the UA finds her and makes a transaction, I think she will accpet this deal.

Althought Paul remove the wardings and cause the escaping of bad spirit, I still think Paul and Cass will not be the opponent. They will fight together.

entry.title: Fourth-English-Blog
entry.content:
Fourth blog for Shadows cast by stars

For this blog, I will write down something that surprised me in the novel.

  1. The First things is the attitude to the MÃ©tis of the elders. At the begining, I think the elder must be bright and he will give Cass a fair result. But I am wrong, he chose to believe the words of Cedar, The â€œpureâ€ aboriginal people. And He sweared Cass â€œStupid half-breedâ€ â€œIdiot Kidâ€.

  2. The second one is the changing of Cedar. When I first knew Cedar, I had a terrible impression of him. Because he sweared Paul and have a fight with Paul. Cedar also harassed Cass and made Cass in a big trouble. But when Cass were on the way to boundary and got wet by the rain, Cedar gave Cass his blanket to keep Cass warm. He also talked with Cass to help her get rid of the boring.

  3. The third one is that the UA government want to kill the Band instead of get their blood. I am really surprised by that. Because at the begining of the book they always say the blood of aboriginal people is very percious. But now, the UA government can just kill them and leave. Maybe the UA find a new way to heal the plague.

  4. The fourth one is the sudden death of Madda. This one is not too surprise me. Because in many books or novels I have read, The gay who know everything always will be killed.

entry.title: Third-English-Blog
entry.content:
Third blog for Shadows cast by stars

Avalon is a interesting girl in the story. Although she is not the main character, I still think she will be an important character in the story. Letâ€™s organize the relationship between Avalon and Cass.

Avalon and Cass meet for the first time when Cass and Pual firts come to the Island. At that time, I feel that Avalon is not friendly to Cass. It gives me a bad impression of the people in the Island.

Cass meets Avalon for the second time at Maddaâ€™s home. Avalon said a strange sentence to Cass â€œDo you miss it? The Corridor.â€ That shows that Avalon doesnâ€™t like living on the Island. Accroding to Madda, When Avalon lived in Corridor, she had a modern life. I think Avalon had use to the modern way and she must want to keep away from the old way.

For the third time, Cass and Avalon meet at the gathering and Cass finds that Avalon like Bran as well, she even kiss Bran. In later stories, I think Avalon will become the main opponent of Cass. They have the different lifestyle, they both like the same boy.

Paul will be in a awkward situation, he like Avalon but Avalon is the enemy of his sister. Which side will Pual choose? Cass side? or Avalon side?

I am looking forward to the following plot.

entry.title: Second-English-Blog
entry.content:
Second blog for Shadows cast by stars

When Cass and Helen are doing the basket with other women, I notice that all the women show the obvious hostility to Cass. Cass wants to say something against, but Helen ask Cass to pretend her didnâ€™t hear. So, I have two question. One is that why the women show the hostility? The other is that why Helen choose to submit to humiliation? In my opinion, I think that the women may get some hurt from the new people and now they canâ€™t trust other people like Cass. According to Madda, there are something bad happend to Helen and Madda canâ€™t tell Cass now. I wonder what is happen to Helen.

Madda gives Cass medicine bag and tell her donâ€™t open it, she will know when the time is right. But Cass opens it on the way back to home. There a carving inside, a tiny womanâ€™s face chiseled out of cedar. Then the carving makes Cass feel uncomfortable, so Cass just throws it into river. How can a carving be a medicince? What will happen when Madda know that Cass throw the carving, will it cause some bad consequence?

When their father look at the old picture, he chooses to hide the truth of the boy. I am interested in who is the little boy and why father chooses to donâ€™t tell the truth to the kids. In my views, the boy may the brother of Mr. Mercredi and the boy already died because of Mr. Mercredi. That is one of the reason why Mr. Mercredi and his wife choose to Corridor.

entry.title: First-English-Blog
entry.content:
First blog for Shadows cast by stars

Here is my first blog for Shadows cast by stars. I will write down some thoughts and observations.

When I read the book, I think there is not a wrong side as a spectator. For the UA, they just want to save the white people. Maybe they believe that using one life to save more lives is a right thing. For â€œThe Bandâ€, they want to survive and have a normal life. I think the reason why we think the UA is evil is because the main characters are MÃ©tis. If the main character is a white person who has the plague and the UA cure him. The UA may become a good government.

The reason why Paul fight with others is interested me. Paul fight with them because they call Paul â€œAppleâ€. Apple means that Red outside and white inside. It is a ridicule for MÃ©tis. In China, there is something similar to â€œAppleâ€. We call a Chinese person who more readily or strongly identifies with Western culture than traditional Chinese culture â€œBananaâ€. It means that Yellow outside and White inside.

I have observed that Cass doesnâ€™t find her â€œShadeâ€ yet. I think the abilities of Cass are powerful, so it costs more time for Cass to discover.
